name: CP_2_1_Render_externally_sourced_Clinical_Documents
title: CP.2.1 Render externally-sourced Clinical Documents (Function)
description: Render clinical documentation that has been captured from multiple external sources.
purpose: Documentation relevant to the patient record can be captured from many external sources and should be rendered appropriately alongside other information in the patient record.

statement.label: CP.2.1#01
statement.requirement: IF the system conforms to function [[CPS.2.1]] (Support for externally-sourced Clinical Documents), THEN the system SHALL provide the ability to render externally-sourced clinical documents.
